text: Mba tugen Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ wo phorga rui ŋaara gumgi ga nzuai, “Shɨk ki guma mbe, ana won shɨga zɨtɨgi zav guma mbe ndi fagim, ana ana shɨga garav ana zɨtɨgi. Mba guma, ana mba guma shɨga zɨtɨgap ana gari mpiiŋsɨk ma. Mba mpiiŋsɨk kav kim, gumgi mbari mbe zav mba shɨga mbui guma bakɨme han zegap khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Guma rum, ndu wo shɨga ganɨv, ana zɨtɨgɨ zav fagi mpiiŋsɨk, ana ndu shɨga garav fhura ndun bigi ndi ndɨɨim, nta vhɨzi.’
